text: @TeamTrump @realDonaldTrump You LIED TO US AN KILLED MY MOTHER,MY DAUGHTER,MY AUNT,MY SISTER,MY COUSIN.. If you had been TRUTHFUL with us from the beginning we could have protected ourselves better!  Instead YOU LIED ABOUT THE CORONAVIRUS, and KILLED MY FAMILY!!
